CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 21, 1945, pg. 9, reads: "Mrs. Robertson Honored - Mrs. S. P. Robertson of New Orleans, La., the houseguest of Mrs. Burl Moone for the past week, was guest of honor at a charming reception last week, given at the home of Mrs. Alma Illery by Mrs. Earl V. Hord,   Mrs. Illery and Mrs. Thomas Stokes...  In the other picture are shown young ladies who served during the delightful affair:  Misses Junetta Davis, Dorothy Littlejohn, Verna Jean Reed, Ernestine Zellars, Vera Reed and Emma Hunter. - Harris Photos.
TitMainTitle: Junetta Davis, Dorothy Littlejohn, Verna Jean Reed, Ernestine Zellars, Vera Reed, and Emma Hunter gathered in home of Alma Illery
